vote.title: Authorize an Interlocal Agreement with the Richardson Independent School District (“RISD”) for the provision of police services by the City of Dallas (“City”) in the RISD’s Lake Highlands High School, junior high schools, and elementary schools within the limits of both the City and RISD - Estimated Revenue: General Fund $1,804,624.37
